posts.postText:
dear gm 

a friend om mine (a "friendly" spycrab)
signed up on the forum but for some strange reason his acount isnt workin
plz look at it and help him
thx
Did he get a confirmation email?
I don't even think there IS a email for us o.o I thought I remember not having to accept one (thank god, that shit is annoying)

We do have a confirmation email. If your freind still can't get in then tell him to try to click this button
 http://i41.photobucket.com/albums/e285/umean123/help.png 
Yeah. My password is 32 characters. Deal with it.

Okay first thing i have to say is... WTF PHAROAH.... 32 characters??? HOW U RMB THAT???


Secondly, I am pretty sure when i signed up. I didnt get a confirmation letter....

Thirdly, check the 1st one. Please answer it pharoah im really curious now...

>> Okay first thing i have to say is... WTF PHAROAH.... 32 characters??? HOW U RMB THAT???


Secondly, I am pretty sure when i signed up. I didnt get a confirmation letter....

Thirdly, check the 1st one. Please answer it pharoah im really curious now... 
32 letters isn't even that much. I know a kid that has a password spanning at least 40 for a few different things, hell even I had one that almost broke 20 at one point, but that was just to piss off my little brother.

>> I once used "howmuchwoodcouldawoodchuckchuckifawoodchuckcouldchuckwood" 
I think mine was "enteryourusernamehere" at one point.
